title: What’s your views on WAQF BOARD ACT 1954&1955
selftext:
So if you dont know Waqf Act stabilised in India under Nehru's Govt. And got "ultimate powers" after 2000 if they just think xyz property belongs they will get it, few months ago they claimed a temple (700+ years old ) and a whole village, after Railways and Indian Army they have nearly 6 Lakh acors of Land

Correct me if I’m wrong with provisions
comments: Misuse of powers. I am definitely against it. They are doing whatever they want.

What is Gobhiji doing? He is in power and has a absolute majority. Why he don't take down these laws if they really are the problem. And why haven't ch@ddis protested and demanded removal of it for last 10 years?
It is a stupid act. We have a quite few acts and laws, that are just one sided.

BJP is so incompetent that they can't strike down shit that they say is illegal and unfair. 
10 years with favorable majority and they have done nothing?
Not one bill, not one case, no action.


Fuckers are useless.
